title.rendered: Bring Safety Home with the Alticor Inc Coloring Book

content.rendered:
This Construction Safety Week, friends and family are also encouraged to participate and join in on the fun! For the first time ever, Alticor Inc has created a special coloring and activity book that emphasizes the importance of safety and what it means to promote a zero-accident safety culture.

Coloring, no matter what the age, has been proven to relieve stress and induces the same state of meditation—so you don’t even have to be a Alticor Inc’ little to take advantage of this creative outlet! So download the book below, grab your favorite crayons and colored pencils and share your creativity and dedication to safety to the world.

Download the Alticor Inc coloring book
